citation.abstract: The patterns of excess alcohol consumption among children aged 11-15 years are not routinely assessed in England and neither are the alcohol consumption patterns of adolescents aged 16-18 years. The aim of the present research was to examine patterns of excess alcohol consumption among English school children aged 11-18 years.
citation.title: Patterns of excess alcohol consumption among school children in two English comprehensive schools

blogs.title: Patterns of excess alcohol consumption among school children in two English comprehensive schools

author.name: ALCOHOL REPORTS
author.description:
An international website dedicated to providing current information on news, reports, publications,and peer-reviewed research articles concerning alcoholism and alcohol-related problems throughout the world. 

Postings are provided by international contributors who monitor news, publications and research findings in their country, geographical region or program area of interest. 

All postings are entered without editorial or contributor opinion or comment.
